condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: ROMP Output 1.2: (HIV/AIDS) Enhanced regional partnerships for evidence-informed policies for accelerated implementation of HIV interventions

description.narrative: The HIV Section strengthened its leadership role as a regional partner on the HIV response, advocating and influencing the agenda for children and adolescents. Results included leveraging substantial new resources; critical engagement to ensure success of the new UNAIDS working model; and, amplified information sharing and guidance for country offices. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:09/12/2017
